channel.title: clrmd on minidump.net
channel.description: Recent content in clrmd on minidump.net

item.title: Writing native WinDbg extensions in C#
item.description: Using NativeAOT and ClrMD to write a native WinDbg extension in .NET.

item.title: Reading AsyncLocal values from a memory dump
item.description: This article explains how AsyncLocal values are stored in .NET and how to retrieve them from a memory dump.

item.title: Analyze your memory dumps in C# with DynaMD
item.description: Browse memory structures from a memory dump in C#, just like you would with ClrMD, but in a more fluent way.

item.title: Dumping stack objects with ClrMD
item.description: How to implement the WinDbg DumpStackObjects command in ClrMD.

item.title: Writing ClrMD extensions for WinDbg and LLDB
item.description: Guide on how to write debugger extensions that are compatible with both WinDbg and LLDB.
